title: LOL Client Bug
body:
Hey guys, 
I have recently noticed that my Lol Client frequently gets a white border on the right and bottom edge of the program, which pushes the program left and up like 10 pixels. This usually happens when i press a button in client. It is very annoying, so i did a Windows 8 system REFRESH, hoping it would go away, but it it still there. Can anyone help me please.....

replies.body:
Could you upload a screenshot of that happening? Very peculiar.

Do you have any third-party window managers installed?
thanks for replying but it is mostly gone now...

Twenty days later.

Hm, better than nothing, I guess.

If it ever comes back, get in contact with me!
